mapper.select: SELECT APV_NO, APV_DIV_NAME, APV_TITLE, APV_CONTENT, STAFF_MID_NAME, APV_MID_DATE, STAFF_NAME AS STAFF_FNL_NAME, APV_FNL_DATE, APV_REJECT_RSN, APV_REJECT_DATE, APV_WRITEDATE FROM CBH_STAFF cs2,(SELECT APV_NO, APV_DIV_NAME, APV_TITLE, APV_CONTENT, STAFF_NAME AS STAFF_MID_NAME, APV_MID_DATE, STAFF_FNL_ID, APV_FNL_DATE, APV_REJECT_RSN, APV_REJECT_DATE, APV_WRITEDATE FROM CBH_STAFF cs RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT APV_NO, APV_DIV_NAME, APV_TITLE, APV_CONTENT, STAFF_MID_ID, APV_MID_DATE, STAFF_FNL_ID, APV_FNL_DATE, APV_REJECT_RSN, APV_REJECT_DATE, APV_WRITEDATE FROM CBH_APV ch,CBH_APV_DIV cad WHERE ch.APV_DIV_NO = cad.APV_DIV_NO AND ch.STAFF_ID LIKE #{STAFF_ID}) t1 ON cs.STAFF_ID = t1.STAFF_MID_ID) t2 WHERE cs2.STAFF_ID = t2.STAFF_FNL_ID
SELECT * FROM CBH_APV WHERE APV_NO LIKE #{APV_NO}
